title: Overall
stimulusHtml:
8-9:

  • Contains clear, well-developed thesis that reflects an understanding of McCarthyism and its appeal.

  • Supports the thesis with substantial, relevant information.

  • Understands the complexity of the question, including the search for domestic subversion as well as the development of the cold War.

  • Analyzes the appeal of McCarthyism.

  • May contain minor errors.

5-7:

  • Contains limited thesis which may be weakly developed.

  • Supports the thesis with some factual, relevant information.

  • Demonstrates a limited understanding of complexity; may be unbalanced, concentrating only on foreign affairs.

  • Describes and/or explains McCarthyism and/or its appeal.

  • May contain errors that do not substantially detract from the overall argument.

2-4:

  • Lacks a thesis, or thesis is confused or undeveloped.

  • Lacks supporting relevant information, or information given is vague/general.

  • Ignores complexity, especially regarding domestic subversion.

  • May describe McCarthyism with little or no concept of appeal.

  • May contain major errors.

0-1:

  • May simply paraphrase or restate the question.
